definition: to fold/to fold over in layers/to furl/to layer/to pile up/to repeat/to duplicate

sentences.english: According to the conodont and fusulinid fossils, their ages are determined to be Devonian -Permian.
sentences.chinese: 根據所含化石確定地層形成時代爲泥盆紀至二疊紀。

sentences.english: The Permian was curtailed by massive volcanism.
sentences.chinese: 二疊紀被大量火山爆發縮短了時間。

sentences.english: The metallization is controlled by the Permian volcanic lithofacies and volcanic edifice.
sentences.chinese: 其成礦作用主要受二疊紀火山岩相及火山機構控制。
